error.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.heading: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: We are committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

howWeUseInfo.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUseInfo.provideServices: Provide and maintain our marketplace services
howWeUseInfo.sendUpdates: Send you important updates and notifications

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing
informationSharing.description: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:
informationSharing.serviceProviders: With trusted service providers who assist in our operations
informationSharing.businessTransfers: In case of business mergers or acquisitions
informationSharing.legalRequirements: When required by law or to protect our rights

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information:
dataSecurity.encryption: Data encryption in transit and at rest

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience and analyze website usage.
cookies.control: You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or your personal data, please contact us:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.heading: Terms of Service
terms.description: Please read these terms carefully before using our services. By accessing our platform, you agree to be bound by these terms.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By accessing and using AlohaMarket, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.
acceptance.agreement: If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

serviceDescription.title: Description of Service
serviceDescription.description: AlohaMarket provides an online marketplace platform that enables users to buy and sell products. Our services include:
serviceDescription.marketplace: Online marketplace for buying and selling

userAccounts.title: User Accounts
userAccounts.description: To access certain features of our service, you must create an account. You agree to:
userAccounts.responsibleUse: Be responsible for all activities under your account
userAccounts.notifyChanges: Notify us of any unauthorized use

userConduct.title: User Conduct
userConduct.description: You agree to use our service responsibly and in accordance with these terms:

prohibited.title: Prohibited Activities
prohibited.harassment: Harassment or abuse of other users

required.title: Required Behavior
required.followLaws: Follow all applicable laws and regulations

paymentTerms.title: Payment Terms
paymentTerms.securePayment: All payments are processed securely through our payment partners
paymentTerms.acceptedMethods: We accept major credit cards and digital payment methods
paymentTerms.feesAndCharges: Service fees and charges are clearly disclosed
paymentTerms.refundPolicy: Refunds are subject to our return policy
paymentTerms.disputeResolution: Payment disputes are handled through our resolution process

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description: We respect intellectual property rights and expect our users to do the same:
intellectualProperty.ownersRights: AlohaMarket owns all rights to the platform and its content
intellectualProperty.userContent: Users retain rights to their own content but grant us usage rights
intellectualProperty.respectRights: Users must respect others' intellectual property
intellectualProperty.reportViolations: Report any copyright or trademark violations

limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.description: Our liability is limited to the extent permitted by law:
limitationOfLiability.noWarranty: Services are provided 'as is' without warranties
limitationOfLiability.userRisk: Users assume risk for their transactions
limitationOfLiability.indirectDamages: We are not liable for indirect or consequential damages
limitationOfLiability.maximumLiability: Our maximum liability is limited to the amount paid for services

termination.title: Termination
termination.description: Either party may terminate this agreement:
termination.immediateTermination: We may terminate accounts for violations
termination.suspendServices: We may suspend services for maintenance or updates
termination.userTermination: Users may delete their accounts at any time
termination.dataRetention: Data may be retained according to our privacy policy

changesToTerms.title: Changes to Terms
changesToTerms.description: We may update these terms from time to time. Material changes will be communicated to users.
changesToTerms.notification: Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of new terms.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: If you have questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:
